name: Tic-Attack-Toe
description:
Made by Steven Miller for miniLD #63


Tic-Attack-Toe is a combination of Tic-Tac-Toe and a turn-based shooter. Move across the board with your units and capture flags to claim spaces. Get three in a row to win. You can play as the O's, who are tired of the tyrannical X's always going first and unfairly winning games, or the X's, who are trying to stop the O's rebellion.

Features:
Tutorial
Settings
Pause Menu
12 Maps
AI that almost works
Multiplayer
3 different units
Everything (except for pausing, which is escape) is controlled by the mouse
Some audio from a game I made a month ago (The Roots of Darkness)

Made using GameMaker Studio
